articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag says the onus is on Jadon Sancho to facilitate his return to the club's first-team squad.
articles.title: Ten Hag says Sancho's Man Utd return 'up to him'

articles.description: Stephen Curry scores 34 points for the Golden State Warriors but is unable to stop their 138-136 overtime defeat to the Oklahoma City Thunder.
articles.title: NBA: Oklahoma Thunder claim overtime win over Golden State Warriors

articles.description: Tennis legend Chris Evert says her cancer has returned, two years after being diagnosed with ovarian cancer.
articles.title: Tennis legend Evert says cancer has returned

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says the actions of Formula 1's governing body have been "unacceptable" in launching an inquiry into Toto and Susie Wolff.
articles.title: FIA inquiry into Wolff 'unacceptable' - Hamilton

articles.description: Federico Gatti scores the only goal as Juventus edge Napoli to move top of Serie A.
articles.title: Juventus beat Napoli to move top of Serie A

articles.description: Russian and Belarusian athletes will be allowed to participate in the Paris 2024 Olympic Games as neutrals, the IOC confirms.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Russian and Belarusian athletes allowed to compete as neutrals

articles.description: Nick Kyrgios says he will miss the Australian Open in January because of ongoing injury concerns.
articles.title: Kyrgios confirms he will miss Australian Open

articles.description: Europe will need to "rewrite the rules" for Ryder Cup eligibility following Jon Rahm's move to LIV Golf, says Rory McIlroy.
articles.title: McIlroy wants Ryder Cup change after Rahm LIV move

articles.description: After mistakes against Luton Town, does goalkeeper David Raya deserve to keep his starting place at Arsenal ahead of Aaron Ramsdale?
articles.title: Why Arsenal rotation would not help Raya or Ramsdale

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo marks the 1,200th professional match of his career by scoring one goal and assisting another for Saudi Arabian club Al-Nassr.
articles.title: Ronaldo scores on 1,200th career appearance
